title: ICE during macro expansion: index out of bounds: the len is 5 but the index is 5

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
### STR

``` rust
use std::io::MemWriter;

fn main() {
    let (foo, bar) = ((), ());
    let ref mut sink = MemWriter::new();
    // OK
    (writeln!(sink, "{} {}", foo, bar)).unwrap();
    // ICE
    (writeln!(sink, "{} {}", foo), bar).unwrap();
    //                             ^~ misplaced the `bar` argument
}
```
### Version

``` rust
rustc 0.12.0-pre (4067252de 2014-09-07 14:31:24 +0000)
```
### Backtrace

